fees.name: BRIDGINGLOAN
fees.additionalInfo: Administration fee to cover the cost of setting-up a bridging loan when buying and selling a property

fees.name: CONSTRUCTIONLOAN
fees.additionalInfo: Construction loan fee which includes up to five progress payments to suppliers, additional construction loan progress payment fees $50 per payment

fees.name: LEGALFEES
fees.additionalInfo: First Option covers the first $1000 of Valuation and Legal Fees, other external costs are on-charged at-cost.

fees.name: MORTGAGEDISCHARGE
fees.additionalInfo: Calculated at time of Discharge, up to a maximum of $600

fees.name: GOVERNMENTFEESCHARGES
fees.additionalInfo: Stamp Duties and other government costs depend on value of the property and state
